explains: n. （Nun）人名；（中）能（广东话·威妥玛）；（朝）嫩；（匈、以）努恩

sentences.en: It has confirmed me in my decision not to become a nun.
sentences.cn: 这已让我坚信我不当修女的决定是正确的。

sentences.en: Were you a nun here eleven years ago?
sentences.cn: 你是十一年前在这里的修女吗？

sentences.en: One nun took the glass back to the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 一位修女把玻璃杯带回厨房。
